chrom.description: A string specifying the chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string specifying the default genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

data.description: Custom cytoband data, as a dataframe with the followingcolumns: "seqnames", "start", "end", "width", "strand","name", "gieStain"

orientation.description: Character value indicating the orientationof the ideogram

showBands.description: A logical value indicating whether to drawcolored cytobands within ideogram

fill.description: (optional) A vector specifying alternate colors for cytobandstains

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying ideogram x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying ideogram y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying ideogram width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying ideogram height

just.description: A string specifying the justification of ideogram relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only given asnumerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output should beproduced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
